channel.title: Hosters searching for EarthScape
channel.description:
[b][font=Verdana][color=green]Hello guys , i need a hoster but there is something ( allready got 2 , 1 not much online and the other only hoste earthscapePKZ ) , if u wonna be hoster u need to answer on this :
- how long can u put the server online - is ur computer fast - know how to compile - know how to make a network on hamachi or setting up no-ip
The normal EarthScape needs a good hoster with fast computer else laggz or u can't even run it ...
The EarthScape PKZ is for every computer GOOD :D => no LAGGS at all
post this here or on my forum
some explaination of the server
this is whats in it :
[b][font=Verdana]MINI GAMES : -flying race true a cirquit with some cool thingys -racing in cars with cool little thingys -gamble , totally changed !!! -player owned beers (kinda mini game :D ) -TZOK JAD MINI GAME => PEST CONTROL (kinda) -RANDOM EVENT
SKILLZ - all of them work - added flying skill (check server) - added player owner beers - going to add my version of construction
OWNERS - mod_pur3 - def pure - nomis (=hoster)
ADMINS - tetra pk - usernamepl0x
RULES - do not ask for mod or adming its getting anoying - fast clicking may , its not disconecting u - double click in wildy is forbidden dues server crashes !!! - u may use ice barrages here :D -don't spam
SOURCE BASED - a normal testscape source (added alot)
WARNING SYSTEMS - report abuse - contact mod and hell send a warning sign , the player will be warned then - kicking - ip ban
FOR MORE CHECK SERVER [/font][/b]
[b][font=Verdana]now some other news : all skillz working , no more glitches on armor new skill flying and player owner beer , buildingg commands at emotes , special attacks , many shops , all npc are dropping , many training places , clans !! , membership , ban commands , modhelp , flyinghelp , ... , more things at emotes , warning system , perfect food timer , ring of stone , many commands , deleting objects , 2 modislands and 1 modcave with portals , full ancients ... ,pickpocking at thieving , barrows special effects / attacks , mini games , when u eat u don't lose ur shield and wep , some armor 1 def , firework when u lvl ... , stealing from other players (cash ) , working on my own construction , character thingy workz, ... and really really verry verry much more
no more losing stats got finally autosaving in both servers !![/b]
[glow=green,2,300][b]-- UPDATES EVERY DAY : sometimes big ones other time little ones --[/b][/glow]
[b][font=Verdana][color=blue]so this is a short explaination for more check the server , really pwnage , here is the hamachi
[b]server pictures = (POSTING PICTURES OF THE EARTHSCAPE PKZ SERVER SOON)[/b]
